election_record.label: Delaware 1799 U.S. Senate, Special

overview.note: Vacancy caused by the death of Joshua Clayton.

"This day between one and two o'clock our Legislature proceeded to a choice of a Senator, and have chosen the Honorable William Hill Wells, your colleague, whom I suppose will soon be with you if necessary - communicate this to Mr B. Poor Doctor Sykes has been again defeatd." Richard Bassett to Henry Latimer. January 7, 1799. Latimer Family Papers. MS 117 Box 5. Special Collections. University of Delaware. Folder 2, #375.

election_record.reference: Journal of the Delaware House of Representatives, 1799.
Richard Bassett to Henry Latimer. January 7, 1799. MSS 117, Box 5, Folder 2, #375. Latimer Family Papers. Special Collections, University of Delaware Library, Newark, DE.
